sentences.sContent: It seemed impossible that anyone could endure such pain.
sentences.sCn: 似乎谁都不可能忍受这样的疼痛。

sentences.sContent: ...To what extent are Americans really willing to endure the environmental impacts of domestic energy production in order to cut back imports...

remMethod.val: end(结束) ＋ ure → 坚持到结束 → 忍受， 容忍

words.tran: 能忍耐的；可忍受的；能持久的

trans.tranCn: 忍受， 容忍； 持久， 持续
trans.tranOther: to be in a difficult or painful situation for a long time without complaining
